main.name: Harivenkataramani
main.bio: I'm a MERN Stack Web Developer based out of Chennai, India who has been in this field for 2 Years. My passion is all about creating elegant websites and solving complex problems in User Interface and Web Functionalities. When i am not coding. I'm probably playing Cricket
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: Design and develop Web applications using Specialized Web Technologies like React, NodeJs, MongoDB, Redux, WebPack, JSON, AJAX

work.title: Systems Engineer
work.description: Developed admin and associate web application for Warehouse Inventory Management System, which provides the Presentation Layer of Inventory, Sales, Purchasing dashboard across multiple locations for the admin. Handled complex logic displaying dashboard data in graphs along with various filters for real-time data.
